Title: Big Hero 6
Overview: A special bond develops between plus-sized inflatable robot Baymax, and prodigy Hiro Hamada, who team up with a group of friends to form a band of high-tech heroes.
Keywords: brother brother relationship, hero, talent, revenge, best friend, another dimension, robot, boy genius, hate, aftercreditsstinger, moral dilemma, 3d, teen superheroes, dead brother
production_companies: Walt Disney Pictures, Walt Disney Animation Studios
Cast: Scott Adsit, Ryan Potter, Daniel Henney
